it doesn't have any physical inertia or
inherent stability keeping it going
forward in a straight line you can
imagine that if the GPS keeps telling
the autopilot that its position is
constantly moving around plus or minus
one meter or so relative to the actual
position then the boat will constantly
try and achieve that false position
reported by the GPS and this causes the
wandering to fix this we need to filter
the GPS position and the nav l1 period

in accuracy was also causing it to have
